授業目的:
Enabling students' knowledge building and critical thinking on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, as well as the developmental aspects, and global-local impacts of NGOs 
Students can use the learning for organizing, and lead, NGOs/ NPOs activities in different settings.
到達目標:
Students can make critical analysis on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, and can assess the impacts of NGOs.  
Students can work effectively with NGOs activities as organizer, or better, demonstrating leadership, as well as policy analyst.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】N.G.O.（総合政策学部）/非政府組織論（総合政策学部）
関連科目:

トピック.授業計画1:
Lecture by Teacher, Presentation by Students, Small Group Discussions & Debate in ENGLISH
2 Reading Weeks - up to 4 classes (for Book & Project Review, with no Lecture) 
2 Fieldwork Exercise (to be done by Students), Case Studies and Reading Weeks when no lecture conducted.  Details at LUNA On Demand e-Learning and Y-Drive Study Materials
トピック.授業外学習2:
English will be the Medium of Instruction. Active Participation and Strong Self-Learning are required.
Active Participation in Class and Preparation for NGOs Profile, Case Studies and Fieldwork are expected.   Details at LUNA On-Demand e-Learning

評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
This Course is taught in ENGLISH Only. Creative contribution showing learning results is expected. In addition to Course Work Report and Assessment; ORAL TEST and Examination in ENGLISH might be taken to Assess Student's Learning and the Notes at 12th, 13th & 14th Classes. Students might be asked to revise and re-submit the Report & Notes of Learning: Additional Oral (in class or online discussions) examination might be conducted. In-Class or Online Test might be conducted to check the progress of learning
